channel.title: Need help withlaunching the actual server with client
channel.description: I have all my port forwarding and no-ip stuff done but i cant find out how to play the dang thing any help is greatly accepted :)

item.dc:creator: @devin97 devin97
item.description:

thx for the help got server up and running =-)

item.title: Need help withlaunching the actual server with client
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

in the server/source there is a batch file usually called run.bat, runserver.bat, play.bat click on that

a command window will pop up than on your client (depending what your using)

go into gui.java OR client.java

search for serverip =

put your ip inbetween those and compile than run your client.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help withlaunching the actual server with client

item.description:
@elf_run1 wrote:

erm…just run it…in the folders should be something like run.bat or runeserver or launch.bat
run the source and the client
